questions.question: What is the title of the article published in the Journal of the American Chemical Society that discusses the crystal structure of a sodium compound?
questions.answer: The Crystal Structure of Sodium Formate, NaHCO2

questions.answer: By searching the DOI '10.1021/ja01862a007' on a scholarly database or the publisher's website

questions.answer: Author's name, publication year, article title, journal name, volume, issue, and page numbers

questions.answer: By visiting the publisher's website, pubs.acs.org/JACS, and searching for the DOI or article title

questions.answer: It indicates the article's contribution to the field of chemistry, given the journal's prestige
